title: Google reportedly still wants to bring face unlock to the Pixel 6 Pro
content:
When the Google Pixel 6 series launched, there was one noticeable aspect of the device that stood out like a sore thumb. The fingerprint sensor was fairly lackluster to everyone that used it, and there was no face unlock either. While marketing material that leaked prior to launch suggested that face unlock would at least

The post Google reportedly still wants to bring face unlock to the Pixel 6 Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google apparently still wants to bring face unlock to the Pixel 6 Pro, though the regular variant is oddly not up for consideration.
